translations: v.（价格）飞涨，猛涨；（使）……猛然上涨

phrs.translation: 一飞冲天, 平步青云, 扶摇直上, 飞涨
快速上升, 快速上升迅速增加
小小火箭, 扶摇直上的故事

sentences.sentence: Using corn as motor fuel will cause the price of corn to skyrocket.
sentences.translation: 使用玉米作为汽车燃料将导致玉米价格飞涨。

sentences.sentence: As Silicon Valley has become home to more successful companies, the flood of people to the area has caused housing prices to skyrocket.
sentences.translation: 随着更多成功企业进军硅谷，人们也开始涌入该地区，导致房价攀升。

sentences.sentence: Only in Canada will the temperature skyrocket to 29 degrees Celsius.
sentences.translation: 只有在加拿大气温将飙升至29摄氏度。
